title: The admin System handler page (and others like it) should not be cached
description: appears the pages are cached now, so if you want to refresh the info you have to clear your browser cache.

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.content:
I'm going to upload a patch with all of the admin handlers changed to turn off http caching.

Any objections?

comments.author: Shalin Shekhar Mangar
comments.content:

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.content: I'm going to commit if there is no objection. I don't think its wise to cache any of the admin handler pages.
